revised_title: On the Solvent Power of Liquid Cyanogen and Fluoride of Silver
tldr: The author investigates the solvent power of liquid cyanogen and its chemical reactions with various substances. Out of 132 substances tested, only 14 were dissolved by liquid cyanogen, demonstrating its low solvent power. Additionally, the author examines the reaction between iodine and fluoride of silver, producing a volatile and colorless liquid fluoride of iodine.
